name: Beer Can Bully
description:
Your objective in this fun arcade game is to knock down the cans on the shelf by throwing baseballs.

You begin with 10 baseballs, for each level you complete you gain an extra ball. Keep going through the levels until you run out of balls! Can you beat your high score?

To throw the ball, simply drag the ball to where you want to throw it, and lift your finger off the screen.
